data.title: Beyond Good and Evil (Original Xbox) Game Profile
data.meta_description: Covering your Xbox news, reviews, previews since 2000
data.text:
Latest News

Roll Out With Autobots and Decepticons In New Racing Adventure

Fans can play as iconic AUTOBOTS or DECEPTICONS, including Bumblebee, Megatron, Elita-1 and Optimus Prime and race across battle-race circuits to collect relics and beat opponents.

read more

Power Wash Simulator Gets Alice In Wonderland DLC

This topsy-turvy Special Pack features a wide range of level aesthetics, from opulent maximalism to introspective minimalism, featuring elements such as ornate interiors and fabrics, unique furnishings, custom themed cutlery, crockery and more.

read more

A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead Gets First Story Trailer

Capturing the frantic terror, unnerving atmosphere and gripping human drama that made the franchise famous, A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead is designed for fans of the films, horror games, and story-driven adventures alike.

read more

GRIPPIN, A New First Person Adventure Game

Your mission is difficult yet straightforward: return the Grip to the Grip Shrine, perched on top of the highest Mountain.

read more

KOEI TECMO Reveal DYNASTY WARRIORS: ORIGINS

Fueled by electrifying 1 vs. 1,000 action, DYNASTY WARRIORS: ORIGINS intensifies the battlefield thanks to massive armies populating the screen from end-to-end raging for a fight.

read more

Toy Soldiers Shooter HYPERCHARGE: Unboxed Available On Xbox Now

Hypercharge is the first and third-person shooter action figure game youÂ’ve always dreamed of! Grab your friends, complete objectives, defend the Hypercore against waves of weaponized toys, and defeat Major Evil together in the story campaign!

read more

Marvel Rivals Unveils New Characters, and Game Features

Marvel All-Stars Venom and Adam Warlock join the Unstoppable Line Up of Super Heroes and Super Villains.

read more

See News Archives
